column1: Little Goat Diner////The burgers and home fries were really good
column2: but by the time the food came out
column3: I was in a pretty bad mood.  It wasn't that busy
column4: but they still took a really long time to take our order. Water wasn't served until right before the meal came out.  If you're going to let your patrons sit and wait
column6: at least apologize for the wait and tell them you'll be right with us. That goes a long way with me.
